snippet: They are questioning whether Mr. Trump, who uses the name to deride Senator Elizabeth Warren, also has problems with the people who first inhabited the country.
abstract: Leaders of Navajo Nation say they will not meet with Donald Trump when he visits Las Vegas and Phoenix, despite their earlier invitation to meet with him; rejection of Trump meeting comes as growing number of Native Americans express objections to Trump's repeated use of name Pocahontas as pejorative nickname when referring to Sen Elizabeth Warren.
lead_paragraph: They are questioning whether Mr. Trump, who uses the name to deride Senator Elizabeth Warren, also has problems with the people who first inhabited the country.

headline.main: Donald Trump’s Use of ‘Pocahontas’ Has Native Americans Worried
headline.print_headline: Navajo Leaders Reject Meeting With Trump in Campaign of ‘Pocahontas’ Taunts
